AD_MODULE.NAME: CSV Generic Bank Statement Importer
AD_MODULE.DESCRIPTION: Bank Statement Importer from a generic CSV file
AD_MODULE.HELP:
Imports Bank Statement lines from a generic CSV file with the following columns: Transaction Date,Reference No.,Business Partner Name,Amount OUT,Amount IN,Description
These columns exactly match with their respective fields in the Financial Account's Bank Statement Lines tab.
The module also provides a framework that makes it easier to develop new importers for other CSV file formats

AD_MODULE.UPDATEINFO: Removed OpenCSV Library as it is included in a different Module
